overview: Prep school student Masaki Michishita is running as fast as he can to the park restroom when he catches sight of a nice guy Takakazu Abe sitting on a bench. Their gazes overlap. Abe asked Michishita if he wanted to play with him and invited him to a brief wrestling match. Michishita, who has a weakness for nice guys, readily follows him and...... their great adventure begins!
title: Shin Yaranai ka
